name: Fastspot
tag_list: interactive, design, applications, mobile, games, user-experience, ux, cms, apps, content-management-system
overview:
Fastspot is a nationally recognized boutique interactive agency, founded in 2001 and staffed by talented designers, programmers, information architects and creative thinkers who like getting things done. Fastspot has been designing and building beautiful websites and applications for industry leading companies and prominent community and educational institutions such as Discovery Communications, Bucknell University, the Los Angeles Museum of the Holocaust, Brooklyn College, Under Armour, Visit Baltimore and the Smithsonian Institution.

Fastspot is a premiere design agency, widely recognized for their award-winning work, collaborative approach with clients and their ability to deliver successful, long-lasting solutions.

Fastspot has developed a content management system, BigTree CMS which is currently powering over 100 Websites including the University of Puget Sound, Russell & Mackenna, Dickinson College Virtual Tour and Ziger/Snead. You can learn more here: http://bigtree.fastspot.com.

Fastspot has also developed an award winning application for web development teams to collaborate during production, called Denote. Denote offers several account options including a free plan, you can learn more here: http://www.denoteapp.com.

Fastspot continues to explore interactive design and development on the mobile horizon, most recently releasing it’s own word game for the release of Apple’s iPad - Jumbalaya. http://www.playjumbalaya.com.
